## cartesian3 variable

Converts 3D polar/spherical vector `v`<!-- -->, i.e. `[r,θ,ϕ]` (angles in radians) to cartesian coordinates. See `polar3()` for reverse operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cartesian3: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn1<"vec3", "vec3">
```
